did.abstract: Mary Bell's husband, C. C. Bell, was a soldier in the 16th Georgia Infantry during the Civil War. Family letters with typescripts. Many were written by C.C. Bell while in Civil War military camps in Tennessee and Georgia.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Mary Bell's husband, C. C. Bell, was a soldier in the 16th Georgia Infantry during the Civil War.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of family letters with typescripts. Many were written by C.C. Bell while in Civil War military camps in Tennessee and Georgia.
